name: Nightshade 2.5D
description:
Explore an extensively beautiful and rich room filled with Infinitely Limited possibilities while taking care your nightshade flower. Praise the High-End Quality of an 8-bit world. And don't forget to admire the marvellous invisible walls along the way.

At the end of the experience you will feel rewarded for watering a Nightshade Flower at Midnight.

And if you get tired of the excitement and want to add the Ultimate Level of Excitement, enter the cheat code included in the virtual disk so you can be able to face the Ultimate Challenge and fight against the Supreme Boss of the Game with a fully developed and Maxed Out character.

And above everything else, never, and I say NEVER trust in every description you read ;D

Have I forgotten to mention that this game was made for the Meta Game Jam .^(8)^.
